text: phir jab unake paas hamaare yahaan se saty aa gaya to ve kahane lage ki "jo cheez moosa ko milee thee usee tarah kee cheez ise kyon na milee?" kya ve usaka inakaar nahin kar chuke hai, jo isase pahale moosa ko pradaan kiya gaya tha? unhonne kaha, "donon jaadoo hai jo ek-doosare kee sahaayata karate hai." aur kaha, "ham to harek ka inakaar karate hai.
